survey_name: Corporate Sustainability Initiatives Employee Engagement Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee awareness, engagement, and satisfaction with the company's sustainability initiatives to improve future programs.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure awareness levels. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory response.
